div.h3: At GEO Prep Mid-City of Greater Baton Rouge all roads lead to college â€“ and beyond.
div.p: GEO Prep Mid-City of Greater Baton Rouge is a free public charter school serving students from kindergarten through 8th grade and is committed to ensure that all students show growth in character, academics, life skills, the arts, and wellness using teaching skills tailored to meet the needs of each student.

p.span: Very proud of all our GEO Prep parents and thankful to you for adjusting to new methods so quickly due to the Covid-19 crisis. Check out this one example of parents being involved in their childâ€™s education. This is a parent meeting via Google Hangouts. So cool! Thank you parents. Stay safe!

div.p: GEO Prep Academy had it's first annual Sports Banquet on Saturday, May 4th with more than 400 in attendance. Scholars that participated in girls volleyball, flag football, girls and boys basketball, cheer and... https://www.facebook.com/geoprepacademy/posts/2463342550383935
